sense.def:
Kar je
special
, je nenavadno in boljše ali pomembnejše kot druge stvari iste vrste.

seg.quote: ...china that was reserved for special occasions.
Is there anything special you would like for dinner, dear?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
special
opišemo tudi osebo ali stvar, ki ima določeno vlogo ali namen.

seg.quote: He was a special adviser to Mrs Judith Hart at the Ministry.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
special
opišemo nekaj, kar se nanaša samo na eno določeno osebo, skupino ali kraj.

seg.quote: He spoke his own special variety of German.
Hospital food seldom caters for the special needs of the aged.
